title: Unnao rape: Delhi HC rejects Kuldeep Sengar's plea to suspend 10-year jail term
content: The Delhi High Court will decide today on former BJP MLA Kuldeep Singh Sengar's plea to suspend his sentence in the Unnao custodial death case. Sengar, serving a 10-year term for the father's death and a life sentence for rape, has argued he's served nearly nine years.

title: Operation Trashi-I: Paratrooper killed in encounter with terrorists in J&K‚Äôs Kishtwar
content: A fierce gun battle in Kishtwar's remote forests left eight Army personnel injured on Sunday. Security forces engaged two to three suspected foreign terrorists during a search operation. Reinforcements have been deployed, and a massive hunt is underway to neutralize the militants. This marks the third encounter in the Jammu region this year, with intensified operations ahead of Republic Day.

title: 'Water is cold': Rescuers avoided swimming through freezing waters to save Noida techie
content: A young software engineer tragically lost his life after his car plunged into a deep, water-filled pit in Greater Noida. Despite a delivery agent's brave attempt to rescue him, poor visibility and challenging conditions hampered efforts. The victim's father is demanding accountability, citing negligence at the construction site.

title: 'I chose it out of passion': Google founder Sergey Brin on studying computer science
content: Google co-founder Sergey Brin recently shared insights on the evolving value of higher education in the age of AI. He emphasized that passion and curiosity, rather than just credentials, drive success, even as AI capabilities grow. Brin also noted Google's shift towards hiring "self-taught stars" with proven skills over solely relying on traditional degrees.

title: Resort politics brews in Maharashtra; UBT Sena's subtle 'poaching' warning ‚Äî who gets Mayor's chair?
content: Mumbai's mayoral race is wide open after the BMC elections, with the BJP emerging as the single largest party. While Shiv Sena (UBT) and MNS allied, the BJP's strong performance challenges traditional narratives. The Eknath Shinde-led Sena is eyeing the mayor's post, sparking intense political maneuvering and speculation about power-sharing within the ruling alliance.

title: 'Family destroyer': Akhilesh Yadav's brother Prateek calls wife Aparna 'bad soul'; to get divorced
content: Prateek Yadav, son of the late Mulayam Singh Yadav, announced his intention to divorce his wife, BJP leader Aparna Bisht Yadav, accusing her of destroying his family relationships and being self-centered. He plans to move court soon, citing his poor mental health and her alleged indifference.

title: Nitin Nabin set to file nomination for BJP president; 'Sangathan Parv‚Äô under way
content: Nitin Nabin is poised to become the Bharatiya Janata Party's 12th national president, potentially its youngest. The nomination process unfolds today, with senior leaders backing his bid. This organizational shift, termed Sangathan Parv, signals a renewed focus on youth leadership within the party, aiming for enhanced energy and unity.

title: Musk's share purchase: SEC filings confirm $1bn buy
content: Elon Musk has clarified he hasn't sold Tesla shares in three years, revealing he actually bought $1 billion worth last year, a claim supported by SEC filings. This news coincides with Tesla's new North American lithium refinery opening. Meanwhile, investor Ross Gerber criticizes Musk's ties to Donald Trump, blaming them for slowing the US EV transition.

title: India on cusp of upper-middle income status; per capita income to rise; economy set to be 3rd largest
content: India‚Äôs climb up the income ladder was slow for decades, taking 60 years to move from low income to lower-middle income. Since then, growth has sharply accelerated, and a likely transition into the upper-middle-income category by around 2030.

title: Union Budget 2026: Education stakeholders push for AI infra, skill-based learning
content: Education stakeholders ahead of Budget 2026 are calling for targeted investments that strengthen learning outcomes, employability and workforce readiness. With last year‚Äôs Rs 1.28 lakh crore allocation as the base, leaders across schools, higher education, skilling and edtech are seeking continued focus on AI-led learning, climate education infrastructure, green job creation, teacher capacity-building, apprenticeships and stronger industry‚Äìacademia collaboration to align education with emerging economic and technological priorities.

title: Watch: Bihar JD(U) MLA Anant Singh smokes inside hospital
content: ‚ÄòBlowing good governance in smoke‚Äô: Bihar JD(U) MLA Anant Singh smokes inside hospital; triggers rowWatch: Visuals of JD(U) MLA Anant Singh smoking inside Bihar hospital go viral; RJD reacts 'blowing good governance in smoke'

title: Jeff Bezos‚Äô ex-wife's donations questioned - What it revealed?
content: MacKenzie Scott's ex-wife, Jeff Bezos, has donated millions to the Solidaire Network, which funds groups facing FBI and congressional investigations for alleged Hamas ties. While Scott's donations are unrestricted, the network supports organizations like Students for Justice in Palestine. Scott has given billions to various causes, impacting diversity programs and higher education.

title: ‚ÄòWell begun is half done‚Äô: Gavaskar dissects India's defeat; urges team to learn from Kohli
content: Sunil Gavaskar criticised India's batters for failing to provide solid starts in their ODI series loss to New Zealand. He highlighted the lack of support for Virat Kohli, whose century went in vain. Gavaskar urged younger players to learn pacing and temperament from Kohli, while praising Harshit Rana's lower-order effort.

title: Air pollution linked to high BP in children: Doctor explains
content: New research reveals a concerning link between PM2.5 air pollution and elevated blood pressure in children aged 5-12. Studies indicate that prenatal and postnatal exposure to these fine particles can increase blood pressure percentiles and the risk of hypertension. Experts emphasize that reducing exposure early may offer potential for reversibility.

title: India, Pakistan, Canada & more: $1 billion buys a seat on Trump‚Äôs ‚ÄòUN‚Äô ‚Äî who's invited?
content: President Trump's 'Board of Peace,' initially for Gaza, now appears poised for a broader global role, potentially rivaling the UN Security Council. A draft charter, circulated with invitations to countries like India and Canada, outlines a mission for conflict resolution and governance restoration. Membership requires a significant financial commitment, with initial leaders including Marco Rubio and Jared Kushner.

title: Bill Belichick ESPN Role; UNC Post 4-8" (39 chars). Cuts fluff, retains facts
content: Bill Belichick will appear on ESPN‚Äôs ACC Network broadcast of the College Football Playoff national championship game in South Florida. The TV role comes weeks after his first season as North Carolina‚Äôs head coach ended at 4‚Äì8. Belichick is also focused on recruiting, including adding quarterback Billy Edwards Jr. ahead of the Tar Heels‚Äô April 12 spring game.

title: Tom Brady grows wary of past mistakes with Alix Earle amid romance rumors
content: Tom Brady and popular influencer, Alix Earle, turned heads with their romance at the New Year‚Äôs Eve party in St. Barth‚Äôs. The two were spotted standing close to each other as Alix Earle rubbed Tom Brady‚Äôs back. This has sparked chaos among fans as many are excited about their future. But it seems the NFL legend might be ‚Äúsuspicious‚Äù of Alix Earle.

title: Roger Federer revisits Australian Open glory with wife Mirka and kids
content: Roger Federer returned to the 2026 Australian Open with his full family and shared emotional memories from Melbourne. The seven-time champion spoke about reliving past wins, watching old clips, and his children playing with his trophy. Federer also played an exhibition match, giving fans another special moment from the tennis legend.

title: Haldi feast turns hazardous in Thane: 80 fall ill after suspected food poisoning
content: In a heart-wrenching twist at a pre-wedding haldi ceremony in Kalyan, around 80 attendees, including the bride herself, were struck down by suspected food poisoning. With the wedding celebration set for Sunday now indefinitely delayed, the scene turned chaotic as guests suffered from intense vomiting and diarrhoea, resulting in multiple hospitalizations.

title: 'Dhurandhar‚Äô BO day 46: Ranveer Singh starrer crosses Rs 825 crore
content: Aditya Dhar's 'Dhurandhar' continues its remarkable theatrical run, dominating newer releases even on its 46th day. The film achieved a historic milestone on day 40, surpassing 'Pushpa 2' and 'Baahubali 2' in day 4 collections.  With impressive week 6 and 7 performances, 'Dhurandhar' is on track to potentially reach Rs 850 crore in India, facing upcoming competition from 'Border 2'.

title: Kerala man kills self after woman alleges misbehaviour on bus
content: A 42-year-old man allegedly died by suicide after a woman posted videos on social media accusing him of misbehaving on a private bus. The videos went viral, with the man's family claiming the allegations were baseless. Police registered a case of unnatural death following the incident.

title: ‚ÄòWe didn‚Äôt bat long‚Äô: Gill gives blunt verdict; India suffer historic series defeat
content: India suffered their first-ever bilateral ODI series defeat at home against New Zealand, with captain Shubman Gill highlighting the inability of batsmen to convert starts into long innings. Fielding lapses also proved costly. Gill, however, sees the loss as clarity rather than crisis, with time to address areas for improvement before the World Cup.

title: Bihar shocker: Storyteller Shravan Das Maharaj arrested for 'sexually exploiting' minor girl; aide absconding
content: A Mithilanchal storyteller, Shravan Das, has been arrested in Darbhanga for allegedly exploiting a minor girl and forcing her to undergo an abortion. Police are also investigating his associate, Mauni Baba, who is absconding. Meanwhile, opposition leader Tejashwi Yadav criticized the state government, alleging complicity in crimes against women and minors.

title: ‚ÄòI‚Äôm alive. I‚Äôm safe‚Äô: Dramatic video shows Machado‚Äôs secret escape from Venezuela ‚Äî watch
content: Venezuelan opposition leader Mar√≠a Corina Machado was secretly extracted from Venezuela by boat last month, ending nearly a year in hiding. Dramatic footage released by US-based Grey Bull Rescue shows her high-risk midnight escape across the Caribbean. Machado is now safe and has since traveled to Oslo to accept her Nobel Peace Prize.

title: Off-duty woman cop with infant clears massive traffic in Andhra
content: A woman constable, Amudala Jaya Shanti, demonstrated exceptional dedication by clearing a traffic jam to allow an ambulance passage, all while carrying her infant. Despite being off duty and outside her jurisdiction, she managed traffic for nearly two hours, earning praise and a reward from the East Godavari SP.

title: ‚ÄòOnly a thin ray of light‚Äô: Noida techie‚Äôs last moments in abandoned pit; authority cracks whip
content: A 27-year-old software engineer tragically lost his life after his SUV plunged into a deep, unbarricaded pit on a foggy night in Noida. Despite a desperate struggle for survival and attempts by rescuers, the dense fog and the pit's depth hampered efforts. The incident highlights severe safety lapses at the construction site, leading to legal action against the builders.

title: MP man bathes in funeral pyre ashes, takes skull, bones home in plastic bag
content: A man in Datia allegedly bathed in funeral pyre ashes and took a deceased neighbor's skull and bones home. This act led to public humiliation, forced consumption of filth, and a community panchayat-imposed social boycott on him and his family. The man's family claims he was under severe mental stress and influenced by superstition, seeking children.

title: Akasa chaos: Pune‚ÄìAhmedabad flyers' 11-hour wait ends in cancellation
content: Over 150 passengers endured an 11-hour ordeal on an Akasa Air flight from Pune to Ahmedabad due to significant delays, poor communication, and gate changes. The flight was eventually cancelled, with passengers offered refunds or a rescheduled flight the next morning, facing last-minute fare hikes and logistical issues.

title: Gold price surge: Analysts see further gains as safe-haven demand rise
content: Gold price prediction today: Manav Modi of Motilal Oswal Financial Services is of the view that gold prices may continue to scale fresh peaks in the coming days on ongoing geopolitical uncertainty.

title: IND v NZ: Kuldeep‚Äôs form a worry ahead of T20 WC - modest returns show fading zing
content: India's bowlers struggled against New Zealand's centurions, with Kuldeep Yadav's poor form a major concern ahead of the T20 World Cup.  Despite past brilliance, Yadav's recent performances have been concerning, raising questions about his current rhythm and effectiveness as the team prepares for the upcoming tournament.

title: Bengaluru woman, 8-year-old son on way to school mowed down by college bus; driver flees
content: A devastating accident in Vivek Nagar claimed the lives of a mother, Sangeetha, and her eight-year-old son, Partha, as they walked to school. A college bus, reportedly making a U-turn, struck them near the Vivek Nagar bus stop. The driver fled the scene following the tragic incident. Investigations are underway to apprehend him.

title: 'It is time & it will be done': Trump's sharpens Greenland pitch ‚Äî what he said on 'Russian threat'
content: President Donald Trump reiterated his desire for US control of Greenland, citing Denmark's alleged failure to counter a Russian threat. He declared it was "time" for the acquisition, following a US strike on Venezuela. Both Danish and Greenlandic governments, along with EU leaders, have opposed the proposal, and Greenlanders protested.

title: Nipah virus infection: Avoid eating date palm sap, fallen/ bitten fruits, warns doctor
content: Nipah virus fears escalate in West Bengal with two cases identified, one nurse improving while another remains critical. Tamil Nadu has heightened surveillance. This dangerous zoonotic infection, transmitted from bats, boasts a high fatality rate and can cause severe neurological damage. Early detection and prevention are crucial as no specific cure exists.

title: T20 WC visas: ICC confident approvals on track; 42 Pakistani-origin apply
content: The ICC is confident that all T20 World Cup visas for Pakistani origin players, staff, and officials will be secured on time. Despite some recent delays, including for England's spinners, the global body is actively working with Indian missions. Visas for several nations are already processed, with others scheduled soon, aiming for all clearances by January 31.

title: 'Felt like an earthquake': High-speed train derails, smashes into oncoming one in Spain
content: Tragedy struck southern Spain as a high-speed train derailed, colliding with another service and claiming at least 21 lives.  The incident, described as 'extremely strange' by the transport minister, occurred on a straight track.  Rescue efforts are ongoing for those trapped, with rail traffic suspended.  The cause remains under investigation.

title: MNS defiant: Raj Thackeray asks corporators to turn civic houses into ‚Äòbattlegrounds‚Äô
content: MNS chief Raj Thackeray has called on his newly elected corporators to be combative. He acknowledged the party's election results were not as expected. Thackeray stated that corporators must challenge what he called the 'rule of money power'. They are also tasked with opposing policies that harm Marathi interests. The MNS aims to be a strong voice in civic governance.

title: 'Mechanical issue': United flight narrowly avoids crash landing in Orlando; videos shows close-call
content: A United Airlines flight carrying 200 passengers and six crew members narrowly avoided a crash landing at Orlando International Airport on Sunday due to a mechanical issue. The aircraft's nose wheel appeared to detach during landing, blocking the runway. No injuries were reported, and efforts are underway to remove the plane.

title: Travis Kelce‚Äôs Trump comment sparks backlash and questions about Taylor Swift
content: Travis Kelce‚Äôs pre-Super-Bowl comment calling it an honour to play before the president sparked political backlash. With Donald Trump attending, fans questioned Taylor Swift‚Äôs stance. Insiders said Swift was unfazed, stressing Travis Kelce praised the office, not Trump himself. No tension followed. Swift focused on supporting Kelce as the Chiefs chased another Super Bowl title amid intense media scrutiny worldwide buzz.

title: A wedding invitation to the clouds: Inside India‚Äôs frog marriages
content: Across India, communities perform frog weddings, a folk ritual to invoke rainfall during droughts. These ceremonies, deeply rooted in agrarian life and nature's cycles, blend faith, folklore, and collective belief to cope with climate uncertainty.  The practice persists as a cultural lifeline, reflecting a deep connection with the environment.

title: Iran's ‚Äòfull-scale war‚Äô warning amid Trump threats; Pahlavi declares ‚ÄòI will return‚Äô‚Äî key points
content: Iran's state television was briefly hijacked by anti-regime activists, broadcasting opposition messaging and protest footage featuring exiled crown prince Reza Pahlavi. The hack occurred amid weeks of unrest and a severe crackdown, with authorities blaming foreign adversaries for fueling the demonstrations.

title: IND vs NZ: Kohli keeps taking giant strides ‚Äì all the big records India‚Äôs run-machine set
content: Virat Kohli's magnificent 124 in the series decider against New Zealand, though in a losing effort, cemented his legendary status. This 54th ODI century, his seventh against the Kiwis, saw him rewrite multiple records, including most international hundreds against them and highest runs at No.3 in ODIs. Despite India's loss, Kohli's consistent brilliance shone through.

title: Indore‚Äôs richest beggar? Man picked up from street turns out to be crorepati
content: A mission to free Indore of beggars unexpectedly revealed a physically disabled man, Mangilal, who amassed crores.  Known for his discreet methods in Sarafa Bazaar, he collected substantial daily earnings. Upon being approached for rehabilitation, Mangilal disclosed ownership of multiple properties, three rented auto-rickshaws, and a car with a driver, exposing a hidden wealth far beyond his street persona.

title: Los Angeles prevails in divisional round win over Chicago
content: The Bears had been kings of comeback wins, but the Rams are the ones advancing to the NFC title game.

title: Uneven Rams overcome 'bad coaching' in OT win
content: The Rams overcame what Sean McVay called "bad coaching" in Sunday's win over the Bears, using a dominant defensive performance and timely plays to gut out the victory.

title: Stroud on career-worst 4 INTs: 'Let people down'
content: Houston QB C.J. Stroud shouldered the blame after one of the worst outings of his career saw the Texans' season end in a loss to the Patriots.

title: Bears' Williams: Future bright despite painful exit
content: Caleb Williams and the Bears expressed frustration with the way the season abruptly ended, but they left Sunday night with a positive outlook for the future.

title: Pats' D fueled by talk, makes statement vs. Texans
content: Thanks to a swarming defensive performance -- which tied the franchise postseason record with four interceptions -- the Patriots advance to the AFC Championship Game next Sunday against the Broncos.

title: KD moves past idol Dirk for 6th on scoring list
content: Kevin Durant moved into sixth all time on the NBA's career scoring list, passing Dirk Nowitzki, someone the Rockets forward said he has "idolized."

title: Ayton's perfect game helps L.A. right ship in win
content: Deandre Ayton became the first Lakers player since at least 1977-78 to finish a game with 25 points on 100% shooting with zero turnovers.

title: Big Ten, SEC still deadlocked on CFP expansion
content: College Football Playoff leaders held an annual business meeting Sunday but did not reach a resolution on a future format as a deadline looms Friday.

title: Gotterup wins Sony Open, cracks top 20 in world
content: Chris Gotterup opened the new PGA Tour season with three big birdies on the back nine that carried him to a 6-under 64 and a two-shot victory in the Sony Open.

title: üëÄ Offseason guide for all eliminated NFL teams
content: The NFL offseason has arrived for 26 teams. What must each do to have a better season in 2026? We have outlooks, early buzz and predictions.

title: What's next for the Broncos, Patriots, Rams and Seahawks? First look at the NFL's conference title games
content: Let's preview the conference championship matchups. How can the Broncos, Patriots, Rams and Seahawks advance to the Super Bowl?

title: The man, the meme, the legend: Curt Cignetti's rise to viral fame
content: Curt Cignetti has lots to be happy about, but you wouldn't know it by looking at him. His players and assistants break down their favorite Cignetti memes and faces.

title: Let's overreact to divisional round games: Pause Stroud's extension talks? Concern about Stafford?
content: Hold off on any new Stroud deals? Matthew Stafford is in a funk? No Super Bowl yet again for Buffalo? Let's make sense of every divisional round game.

title: Refs during Bills-Broncos called that?! What the NFL rulebook says and our analysis
content: When is a catch a catch and how much contact draws a penalty flag were in dispute Saturday in Denver.

title: Giannis and the Bucks: Four possible pathways forward in Milwaukee at the deadline
content: The Bucks and Antetokounmpo currently sit in 11th place ahead of the trade deadline. What are their options?

title: 'I just want to do Australia proud': Alex de Minaur on challenges ahead
content: Alex de Minaur talked to ESPN about his home major, his "Best Actor" award and the ongoing challenge of playing Alcaraz and Sinner.

title: Denver advances, but Bo Nix is out: Six questions about where the Broncos go from here
content: The Broncos advanced to the AFC title game but lost their QB to a broken ankle. So what's next for them on their Super Bowl quest?

title: Chaotic AFCON final an embarrassment to soccer
content: Fan clashes, VAR controversies, missed penalties, a walkout, Senegal's extra time winner - the AFCON final had it all.

title: Man United deliver huge blow to Man City title hopes with shock derby win
content: Manchester City's title bid is as good as over after Manchester United won the midfield battle at Old Trafford.

title: VAR review: Did Arsenal deserve a penalty?
content: The VAR cleared Forest's Ola Aina on a possible handball that would have given Arsenal a game-changing penalty.

title: Meet 'the special 13': The JMU transfers forming an unlikely Indiana CFP title core
content: Thirteen Dukes players followed Curt Cignetti to become Hoosiers. Those who remain are on the verge of CFB history.

title: Will Fernando Mendoza be the next Heisman-winning QB to fall victim to the national championship curse?
content: Since 1988, seven quarterbacks who have won the Heisman Trophy and earned a title game berth have fallen in the national championship game. Is Mendoza next?

title: Men's: Duke is a 1-seed again
content: Is the ACC back? Eight single-digit seeds -- including one on the top line -- and a couple of bubble teams would suggest so.

title: Women's: South Carolina ascends to No. 2 overall
content: Texas, which fell at South Carolina on Thursday, tumbles to the final No. 1 seed after its second straight loss.

title: Kevin Stefanski to Falcons: Grading the hire and the impact on Penix
content: Kevin Stefanski didn't have a great record in Cleveland, but he'll have more talent to work with in Atlanta.

title: John Harbaugh to the Giants! Eight questions and a grade for New York's move
content: The 63-year-old has been able to call his own shot in this coaching search and wound up choosing the Giants.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea open to Fern√°ndez exit; Madrid, PSG interested
content: Chelsea's Enzo Fern√°ndez could be available this summer as Real Madrid and PSG monitor his situation. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: Transfer window weekly: G√ºler to Arsenal? Chelsea squad changes?
content: The winter transfer window is open, so what are our reporters hearing about deals that could be done?

content: the TOI Business Desk is a vigilant and dedicated team of journalists committed to delivering the latest and most relevant business news from around the world to readers of the Times of India . the desk ensures that TOI readers are well-informed about the ever-changing and dynamic world of commerce .

title: Silver prices hit record high! Silver crosses Rs 3 lakh per kg; gold prices up
content: the TOI Business Desk is a vigilant and dedicated team of journalists committed to delivering the latest and most relevant business news from around the world to readers of the Times of India . the desk ensures that TOI readers are well-informed about the ever-changing and dynamic world of commerce .

title: Fog, Death Turn, 'Save Me' Calls, Futile Rescue: Techie's Final 90 Minutes
content: It was around midnight on Friday when Yuvraj Mehta was driving home in Noida from his workplace in Gurugram. Dense fog had lowered visibility to a minimum as Delhi and its surrounding areas shivered due to a cruel cold wave.

title: Kerala Man Kills Self After Influencer Alleges Assault On Bus In Viral Video
content: A woman influencer travelling on the bus with the man recorded a video alleging that he misbehaved with her.

title: Trump Links Greenland Threats To Nobel Peace Prize Snub
content: Donald Trump linked his claims on Greenland to not being awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in a letter the US president sent to Norwegian Prime Minister Jonas Gahr Store.

title: Round 2 Of CBI Questioning For TVK's Vijay, Officials Say No Clean Chit Yet
content: Actor-politician Vijay has told the Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) that he followed all safety guidelines during the rally at Tamil Nadu's Karur, where a stampede claimed 41 lives

title: Tiger Deaths Continue In Kaziranga, Third Found Dead Due To Infighting
content: A carcass of a female Royal Bengal tiger was recovered at the Kathpora area of the West range of Bagori in the Kaziranga National Park on Sunday.

title: Rich Iranians Partied In Turkey During Anti-Khamenei Protests: Report
content: In Van, the mood inside clubs reportedly remained far removed from politics. Music played, people danced, and talk of regime change never came up.

title: Will Dal Derail Trade Deal? Trump Gets Letter Over India's 30% Pulse Tariff
content: Talks on the India-US trade agreement can once again hit a snag, with pulses emerging as a fresh bone of contention this time.

title: Karnataka Man Stabbed To Death In Hyderabad, Bystanders Record On Phone
content: A video of the incident shows the attacker repeatedly stabbing the man multiple times before the victim collapsed and the attacker fled the scene, leaving Satish in a pool of blood.

title: Opinion: Opinion | Pawars, Thackerays, Congress: One By One, Maharashtra Is Moving On
content: The BJP's victories across regions (it won 23 of the 29 corporations), including the country's plum municipality, the cash-rich BMC, shows how deeply it has dug roots in a state once synonymous with the Congress, the Pawars and the Thackerays.

title: 5.7 Magnitude Earthquake Hits Ladakh And Jammu And Kashmir
content: An earthquake, measuring 5.7 on the Richter scale, occurred on Monday with the epicentre in the Leh area of the Ladakh region and the shocks were felt in Ladakh and Jammu and Kashmir with varying intensity.

title: US Says Trump "Rightfully Deserves" Nobel As Machado Gives Him Her Medal
content: The Nobel Committee must acknowledge Donald Trump's "unprecedented accomplishments" if he cannot receive the Peace Prize, White House Communications Director Steven Cheung has said.

title: 2 High-Speed Trains Collide In "Extremely Strange" Crash In Spain, 39 Dead
content: A high-speed train derailed and was hit by another in southern Spain, killing 39 people and injuring more than 120, authorities said Monday, saying the country's worst train crash in over a decade was "extremely strange".

title: "She Ruined Family": Mulayam Singh's Younger Son To Divorce Wife Aparna
content: Prateek posted a picture of Aparna on Instagram and called her a 'family destroyer' and "selfish", and alleged that she "ruined" his family ties.

title: "There Were No Divers": Father Of Noida Techie Who Drowned In 70-Foot Ditch
content: Yuvraj Mehta lost control of his car and crashed into a waterlogged construction pit located near a road turn amid dense fog and low visibility on Friday night.

title: Delivery Man Who Tried Saving Noida Techie From Ditch Narrates What Happened
content: Yuvraj Mehta died after his car fell into a water-filled pit dug for the basement of an under-construction building near Sector 150 in Noida.

title: Disguises, Boats, Flights: Video Shows Machado's Daring Escape From Venezuela
content: The mission, dubbed Operation Golden Dynamite, was marked by difficult weather conditions and extended periods of uncertainty.

title: 2.8-Magnitude Earthquake Hits Delhi, No Damage Reported
content: A mild earthquake measuring 2.8 on the Richter scale struck New Delhi on Monday morning, causing brief tremors across parts of the national capital.

title: UP Man Kills Wife, Then Dies By Suicide. They Got Married 4 Months Ago
content: A man allegedly killed his wife by slitting her throat and then died by suicide in the Tarya Sujan police station area of the Kushinagar district, police said on Monday. According to the police, the couple had a love marriage four months ago.

title: Silver Price Surges, Crosses Rs 3 Lakh Per Kg Mark
content: Silver prices surged on Monday to cross the Rs 3 lakh-per-kg milestone in futures trade for the first time, supported by strong investor demand and global sentiment in precious metals.

title: "Priority To Save Lives": Mozambique President Cancels Davos Trip Amid Floods
content: Chapo wrote in a post on Facebook late on Sunday that Mozambique "is going through a tough time ... (and) the absolute priority at this moment is to save lives".

title: Points league rankings: Young and Davis slide, Sabonis returns
content: the fantasy basketball head-to-head points league player rankings are updated regularly throughout the season based on player performances, injuries, trades, signings and other trends . the team announced this week that Young's knee and quadriceps injuries would keep him out for at least the next month, if not longer . this news dropped Young to the bottom of the top-60 in points league rankings .

title: Seahawks start fast and roll past 49ers, advance to NFC Championship Game
content: the Seahawks return the opening kickoff for a touchdown and never look back in a rout of the 49ers in the divisional round . coach Mike Macdonald's team now has an even stronger claim as the most complete team in this season's playoffs . the team's top-rated special teams got it started with Rashid Shaheed returning the kickoff 95 yards .

title: NHL trade grades: Why the Rasmus Andersson swap could be a big win for both teams
content: the Calgary Flames traded defenseman Rasmus Andersson to the Vegas Golden Knights for a package that included defenseman Zach Whitecloud . Previously, the Vancouver Canucks traded Quinn Hughes to the Minnesota Wild in exchange for Zeev Buium , Marco Rossi , Liam Ohgren and a 2026 first-round pick .

title: Nick Foles' message to Broncos fans: Pats 'struggle against backup QBs'
content: the Broncos will face the new England Patriots in next Sunday's AFC Championship game . backup quarterback Jarrett Stidham is out for the rest of the playoffs . he hasn't started a game since the final two of the 2023 season .

title: How will latest moves rock the NL East?
content: the nleast east's offseason activity hasn't happened in new york . the national league east is experiencing a dizzying winter with major upheaval . each team has an urgency rating based on how much each still needs to accomplish .

title: Can Miami become the latest team to lift the national title on 'home' field?
content: this year marks the ninth national championship of the BCS and playoff eras . a team playing a national championship game at its home stadium is unprecedented in FBS history . one of the competing squads will be from the same state as the title .

title: Carson Beck the runner? The Miami QB is finally using his feet
content: Carson Beck hasn't run a 40-yard dash in years, but it hardly qualifies him as slow . he showcased his wheels on a 3-yard scramble into the end zone to secure a trip to the college football playoff national championship . safety Jakobe Thomas appeared to be the originator, dubbing Beck as the Miami's version of Michael Vick .

title: 10 NBA teams that could swing trade season's final 20 days
content: the league's three-week sprint to the Feb. 5 trade deadline is here . many contenders are still deciding on a direction . a weekly trip around the Association focuses on those teams trying to add to their rosters .

title: Patriots hold off Texans in turnover-filled divisional round playoff game
content: the new England Patriots beat texans 28-16 in a divisional round playoff game . the Patriots' defense forced five turnovers, intercepting Texans quarterback C.J. Stroud four times . new England quarterback Drake Maye overcame three turnovers to help the no. 2 seed advance .

title: Andhra liquor scam: Enforcement Directorate summons Rajampet MP Mithun Reddy
content: The ED served notices directing Mithun Reddy to appear before the investigation officers on January 23

title: Kannur airport in Kerala gets quick-connection flights to London Heathrow
content: IndiGo and Air India Express begin connecting services via major Indian hubs, enhancing travel options for passengers in north Kerala

title: Vizianagaram railway station needs second entrance in view of the increase in passenger traffic over the years
content: Currently, the station has five platforms, with only one entrance located between the Mayuri and Venkateswara theatre junctions

title: Andhra Pradesh Assembly sessions from second or third week of February
content: Deputy Speaker Raghu Ramakrishna Raju hoped that the YSRCP President Y.S. Jagan Mohan Reddy and the ten MLAs of that party would attend the Assembly

title: Two arrested for social media posts attempting to incite inter-State tension
content: Two functionaries of the Jananaayaga Elurchi Kazhagam allegedly posted provocative content on social media that could incite tension between Tamil Nadu and Karnataka

title: Supreme Court junks PIL on judicial reforms, terms it 'publicity interest litigation'
content: The petitioner had sought a mandate that every court in India must decide a case within a one-year timeframe

title: Why Shiv Sena corporators shifted to hotel; who's afraid of whom? asks Shiv Sena (UBT) Raut
content: The Shiv Sena has shifted its 29 members to a hotel in Mumbai, ostensibly for an orientation workshop to make them aware of the functioning of the country's richest civic body, the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC)

title: NDRF pillar of trust the nation relies on during calamities: Amit Shah
content: The Prime Minister described NDRF skills and sense of duty as the epitome of ‚Äúthe highest standard of service‚Äù

title: Flight operations disrupted as thick fog shrouds Vijayawada and outskirts
content: According to the IMD shallow to moderate fog is likely at isolated pockets over North Coastal Andhra Pradesh and Yanam, while fog or mist is likely at a few places over South Coastal Andhra Pradesh and Rayalaseema on January 20 and 21 as well

title: Supeme Court on SIR LIVE updates: Court directs ECI to display names with discrepancies in block, ward offices
content: The State shall provide human resources to the EC and the State Election Commission at the panchayat bhavans and block offices, ruled the Bench

title: Remarks on Sofiya Qureshi: Supreme Court gives two-week deadline for sanction to prosecute Vijay Shah
content: The apex court had taken seriously exception against Mr. Shah, setting up a Special Investigation Team to probe the case against him

title: Congress spreading ‚Äòlies‚Äô about VB-G RAM G: Government
content: Shivraj Singh Chouhan referred to Congress‚Äô nationwide campaign against the VB-G RAM G, and said the Opposition was spreading ‚Äúlies‚Äù that employment would be provided only in certain panchayats under the scheme

title: Nipah in West Bengal: Tamil Nadu govt. asks health officers to strengthen AES surveillance
content: Persons admitted with AES, particularly those with travel or contact history linked to West Bengal, should be closely monitored and evaluated for possible Nipah virus infection, the DPH said

title: Mother convicted in toddler murder case in Kerala‚Äôs Kannur; co-accused acquitted due to lack of evidence
content: Sharanya‚Äôs friend and alleged paramour, Nithin, the second accused in the case, was acquitted as court ruled that the prosecution failed to establish a criminal conspiracy against him

title: Bengaluru civic polls after May 25, ballot papers to be used instead of EVMs
content: As per directions issued in State Election Commission, the ward-wise draft electoral rolls for all 369 wards were published on January 19 for public inspection while final notification will be published on March 16

title: India‚Äôs first Vande Bharat sleeper train to start from Jan 22: check stops, timings, fares
content: Vande Bharat Sleeper Express begins first commercial run on Kamakhya‚ÄìHowrah route on January 22. Read for more details on timings, ticket price, and train stoppages.

title: Woman, 8-year-old son killed in road accident in Bengaluru
content: The  incident occurred around 7.15 a.m. when the duo were crossing the busy road on their way to Army Public School

title: Noida techie death: Junior engineer sacked, notices issued to traffic work officials
content: Show-cause notices have been issued to other relevant officers and employees responsible for traffic management in and around

content: Chief Justice Manindra Mohan Shrivastava and Justice G. Arul Murugan also order that necessary action must be initiated if complaints are received from such passengers

title: Kerala govt loses legal battle over ownership of Cheruvally estate proposed for Sabarimala airport
content: Pala Sub Court upholds as valid sale of 2,263-acre estate by Harrisons Malayalam Limited to Ayana Charitable Trust in 2005

title: Snake rescues in Telangana increase five fold in 10 years; nearly 50% of snakes rescued in 2025 are spectacled cobras
content: Increase in construction and development activity was one of the factors for the rescues clustered in the urban fringes

content: A bench headed by the then Chief Justice D.Y. Chandrachud (since retired), on October 13, 2023, had dismissed the PIL filed by lawyer Ashok Pandey

title: Leopard kills pet dog in Kerala‚Äôs Kasaragod, triggering panic in local community
content: Forest department says measures, including setting up traps, are being considered to track the animal

title: Chilly conditions grip many places in Punjab, Haryana; slight respite in Kashmir, Rajasthan
content: Kashmir valley is currently in the midst of ‚ÄòChilla-i-Kalan‚Äô, 40 days of extreme cold, during which night temperatures often drop several degrees below the freezing point, and the chances of snowfall are the highest

title: Karur stampede case: Vijay faces second round of questioning by CBI
content: Vijay will be questioned during the day by a team of officials led by a Deputy Superintendent rank officer drawn from the Anti Corruption unit of the agency

title: Centre agreed to procure eight lakh tonnes of rice from Odisha: CM Majhi
content: CM Mohan Charan Majhi also launched development projects worth more than ‚Çπ891 crore to boost irrigation facilities in the drought-prone areas of the region

title: BJP MLC Sandip Joshi, close aide of Fadnavis and Gadkari, announces political retirement
content: In a letter addressed to well-wishers and posted on his social media handles, the 55-year-old leader said politics had always meant more to him than position or prestige ‚Äî it was a path of selfless service and dedication

content: Officials stated that strict action will be taken against those who threaten public safety and misuse social media to spread fear

title: Delhi Republic Day restrictions 2026: routes to avoid, diversions and road closures
content: Delhi Traffic Police have issued a traffic advisory on 17th, 19th, 20th, and 21st of January due to Republic Day Parade rehearsals on Kartavya Path.

title: Clash between rival party workers in Thane's Bhiwandi town; 2 cops among 6 injured
content: Videos circulating on social media showed people throwing stones and police intervening to disperse the crowd

title: Search operations resume to hunt down terrorists in Kishtwar
content: Multiple teams of the army, police, and paramilitary forces, supported by drones and sniffer dogs, are combing the area while maintaining a tight security cordon to ensure that the terrorists are not able to escape

title: Bail before conviction should be matter of right: Ex-CJI Chandrachud on Umar Khalid‚Äôs plea
content: Our law is based on a presumption, and that presumption is that everyone is innocent until proven guilty, he said

title: The return of division talk in J&K and why it‚Äôs dangerous

title: How should India tackle child trafficking? | Explained
content: What is the Palermo Protocol? How does the Bhartiya Nyaya Sanhita, 2023 define trafficking? How does the Constitution of India protect children from exploitation? How has the Supreme Court reacted? Why is a strong Centre-State relationship important for countering exploitation?

title: When rescue workers fumbled, delivery agent entered water-filled pit to help Greater Noida techie
content: Police rejected allegations of negligence saying fire department teams made efforts to save the youth and deployed a crane, ladder, makeshift boat and searchlights, but visibility was near zero due to fog

title: Plea to upgrade Neredmet railway station
content: Suburban Train Travellers Association also appealed to the railway authorities to provide stoppages for all express trains at Malkajgiri railway station, given its importance and the heavy passenger traffic it handles

title: MLB offseason grades: Mets pivot to Bichette after Dodgers sign top free agent Tucker
content: the 2025-26 offseason is officially here, and we have you covered with grades and analysis for every major signing and trade this winter . the deal: three years, $126 million with opt-outs after first two seasons Grade: B- The new york Mets have a new heart .

title: Shipbuilding yard to come up at Ponnani port under PPP model
content: The shipyard will be established on about 29 acres of coastal land on the western side of the Ponnani fishing harbour, making it the second shipyard in the State after Kochi.

title: AICC appoints presidents for district units in T.N.
content: AICC observers assigned to each district conducted detailed reviews, engaged with party functionaries and other stakeholders, and submitted comprehensive reports

title: Temperatures drop as dry weather prevails over T.N.
content: Minimum temperatures were below normal by one degree Celsius to three degrees Celsius at most places over Tamil Nadu, Puducherry, and Karaikal area

title: Mumbai will get Mahayuti Mayor: Eknath Shinde; 'People chose development over emotional issues'

title: Trump aide Peter Navarro renews attack on Delhi, asks why Americans ‚Äòpaying for AI in India‚Äô

title: From back office to cutting edge, India emerges as hub for GCCs
content: The availability of a large, cheaper English-speaking IT workforce led foreign firms to begin setting up subsidiaries in the country 40 years ago. Today, multinational companies have deepened their presence in this multi-billion dollar oasis in the job market, with at least one Global Capability Centre being established every week. From playing a supporting role, GCCs are now shaping the business

title: 9 killed, 80 injured after bus carrying marriage party overturns in Jharkhand's Latehar

title: Kerala Kalolsavam 2026 | Kannur crowned champions at State School Arts Festival
